hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source ~/.bash_profile cd /opt/build/src/razor_yslwellness/build_scripts source /opt/build/src/razor_yslwellness/build_scripts/build.conf p4 sync //builds/ysl/wellness/commonyslbuild.sh sh /opt/build/src/razor_yslwellness/build_scripts/commonyslbuild.sh build ${CHANGELIST} echo BUILD_NUMBER=`cat build.properties | grep Build_Number | cut -d "=" -f2`
cd /opt/build/src/razor_yslwellness/build_scripts echo "BUILD_NUMBER=`cat build.properties | grep Build_Number | cut -d "=" -f2`" > ../bldno.properties

hudson.plugins.sonar.SonarRunnerBuilder.properties:
sonar.projectKey=my:YSLWELLNESS sonar.projectName=YSLWELLNESS sonar.scm.disabled=true sonar.projectVersion=1.0.0 sonar.perforce.port=192.168.210.178:16060 sonar.perforce.clientName=blr-bld-jenkins3.builder.yslwellness sonar.sources=modules/authdom/src,modules/core-services/authentication-crypto-services/src,modules/core-services/authentication-services/src,modules/core-services/context.definition.service/src,modules/core-services/core.support.common/src,modules/core-services/core.support.util/src,modules/core-services/session.services/src,modules/core-services/core.validation.services/src,modules/dapi/src/main/java,modules/jdbcservice/src,modules/configservice/src,modules/logging/src,modules/security/src,modules/dom/src,modules/domx/src,modules/util-filtering/src,modules/yccdom/src,modules/common/src,modules/RestBridge/src,modules/cacheservice/src,modules/cachesupportutil/src,modules/notifications/src,modules/LuceneService/src,modules/yccdomx/src
sonar.java.binaries=modules/authdom/target/classes,modules/core-services/authentication-crypto-services/target/classes,modules/core-services/authentication-services/target/classes,modules/core-services/context.definition.service/target/classes,modules/core-services/core.support.common/target/classes,modules/core-services/core.support.util/target/classes,modules/core-services/session.services/target/classes,modules/core-services/core.validation.services/target/classes,modules/dapi/target/classes,modules/jdbcservice/target/classes,modules/configservice/target/classes,modules/logging/target/classes,modules/security/target/classes,modules/dom/target/classes,modules/domx/target/classes,modules/util-filtering/target/classes,modules/yccdom/target/classes,modules/common/target/classes,modules/RestBridge/target/classes,modules/cacheservice/target/classes,modules/cachesupportutil/target/classes,modules/notifications/target/classes,modules/LuceneService/target/classes,modules/yccdomx/target/classes
sonar.exclusions=**/*l2distributedCache* sonar.jacoco.reportPaths=modules/dapi/target/jacoco.exec sonar.java.coveragePlugin=jacoco sonar.surefire.reportsPath=modules/dapi/target/surefire sonar.language=java

hudson.plugins.textfinder.TextFinderPubl.regexp: ysl build is in progrees. Try after some time
